set.seed(156) # for computational reproducibility

## R Markdown

Let's generate a dataset

```{r makedata}
testdata <- data.frame(
  x = rnorm(n = 30, mean = 4, sd = 1.2),
  y = rnorm(n = 30, mean = 6, sd = 1.6)
)
```

Plot a scatterplot

```{r scatter, fig.cap = "Scatterplot of Y versus X for n = 30 observations."}
plot(testdata$x, testdata$y, main = "", xlab = "X", ylab = "Y")
```
